name: academic-research
description: Comprehensive academic literature review with peer-reviewed sources
objective: Conduct systematic literature review on the research topic, prioritizing peer-reviewed sources, following citation chains, and validating key claims with multiple academic sources

preferred_agents.for: Finding and analyzing academic papers from arXiv, Semantic Scholar, PubMed
Validating key claims with multiple sources
Synthesizing findings into coherent literature review

orchestration_guidance: Prioritize peer-reviewed sources over general web content. Follow citation chains to find seminal papers. For controversial claims, seek multiple independent validations. Map the citation network to identify key papers and research clusters. Focus on recent work but include foundational papers.
